command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/1/5/6/dataset_1560d544-830c-4dd4-91aa-693dfb4886a4.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&            bcftools view     --samples 'NA00002'     --min-ac 1 --max-ac 1 --types "snps"                     --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/c/b/5/dataset_cb512957-b1ac-4c63-96d7-60728162c555.dat'

params.sec_filter: {"exclude_types": null, "known_or_novel": null, "max_ac": "1", "max_af": "", "max_alleles": "", "min_ac": "1", "min_af": "", "min_alleles": "", "phased": null, "private": null, "select_genotype": null, "types": "snps", "uncalled": null}
